messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] State List: Get together for Maryland Unschoolers
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Maryland et al A month ago I started a Florida_Unschoolers list to be able to plan get-togethers and talk about local issues and events...stuff that isn t
messages.messageBody:
Hi Maryland et al
A month ago I started a Florida_Unschoolers list to be
able to plan get-togethers and talk about local issues
and events...stuff that isn't of general interest. We
have a Pot Luck planned for this Friday. Our first
one...Mary (zenmomma) is planning to be there, too. :)
I scanned the message boards and invited everyone
that mentioned living in Fl...and unschooling
(whatever their perceptions). Ya'll might find a
state list helpfull too. Maybe.

Indiana Tamy started an Indiana list, which were I got
the idea. Thanks Tamy.

Sharon of the Swamp


--- ElissaJC@... wrote:
> Where are all Maryland unschoolers living?
> I know we have
> eastern shore
> annapolis
> Upper Montgomery County
> Anyone else?
> Any northern VA people or DC?
> Elissa, who will soon be singing
> Yippee - Kai - Yay!
